title: Encore: Everyone Is Talking To Barry Jenkins, But Our Interview Is (Still) the Best!
description: We revisit Gene's conversation with filmmaker Barry Jenkins to close out 2016.  Jenkins' latest movie is Moonlight. There's buzz for awards nominations, including the Oscars.
